alert.note: Alert for Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MUSKINGUM AND WESTERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with heavy rain and gusty wind over Perry State Forest, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Philo, Pleasant Grove, Fultonham, Cannelville, High Hill, Chandlersville, Ruraldale, Bridgeville, and Duncan Falls. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 145 and 162, and between mile markers 165 and 166. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
